text: NEBL'2000 was the first complete season of the North European Basketball League. The tournament was held during the 1999-2000 basketball season on 5 January – 16 April 2000. After holding Promotion Cup, teams from four more countries – Germany, Russia, Ukraine and Denmark – took part in NEBL'2000. League accepted the participation of Magic M7 from Sweden, with which Earvin "Magic" Johnson entered into an agreement. CSKA won the tournament by defeating Lietuvos rytas in the final.NEBL slogan: Break the ice! Andrius Giedraitis from Lietuvos rytas was named as the Most valuable player. ==Clubs== {|class=wikitable style="text-align:left" !Country (League) !Teams |- | Denmark (Basketligaen) | |- | Estonia
